title: Shattered Expectations
description: Seth HawkinsLead Guitarist, Secretive, UnforgivingThere was something about him that called to me.A darkness that drew me in.But he never noticed me.Until the night he did.One stolen night changed everything. One secret destroyed it all.Riley TemplePhotographer, Temptress, Off-LimitsShe distracted me from my nightmares.Made me feel normal, but it was all an act.An illusion destroyed by one single lie.Shattered by her truth, I walked away.I intended to have nothing more to do with her, but then she ran â€¦ She calls me Lucifer, and everybody knows The Devil always gets his due.A steamy age-gap slight enemies-to-lovers rockstar romance.Please take notice of the content warning at the front of this book.**COMPLETE SERIES**These books are not standalones and must be read in order.Tattooed MemoriesStrawberry Delight (short story - not required to understand the series)Strawberry Lipstick (short story- not required to understand the series)Shattered ExpectationsGuarded AddictionExquisite ScarsBroken HaloNeglected Consequences
author: L. Ann
